title: Ask for a Client Review After Closing
description: A transaction has successfully closed. The agent needs to ask the happy client for an online review.

tasks.description: Wait for a few days after closing to contact the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: A task is created to send the email 3 days after the closing date.

tasks.description: Draft a personalized email thanking the client for their business and asking them to share their experience.
tasks.expected_outcome: A friendly, non-pushy email is written.

tasks.description: Include direct links to the agent's review profiles (e.g., Zillow, Google Business Profile) in the email.
tasks.expected_outcome: The email includes clickable links to make it easy for the client to leave a review.
